system.description: The true glory seekers, Knights are chivalrous to a point but have none of the Duelist's respect for battles. Knights are the weapon masters, well-armored but relying on their swift, powerful attacks and powerful strength to destroy their enemy before they can counter attack. Knights are the real behemoths of the battlefield, leading troops into the fray and slaughtering all they can. If you are a Knight be looking for glory, looking for the next powerful weapon.

overview.base: Your next attack is boosted.

system.endCondition: You make another attack.

overview.base: You gain Improved Strength and Melee Damage Boost. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of cumbersome items.

You may spend a short rest developing a battle plan against another area. You and your allies that are attacking this area when combat begins may each spend 1 MP to gain Triumphant Awaken. In addition, the first attack you and each of your allies makes in this combat is boosted.

system.requirements: You remain in the targeted area.

overview.base: You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
You may spend an unused action to boost the triggering damage.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused action to boost the triggering damage again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a damaging melee weapon attack.
